oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Famous Picture of Cleopatra on the Wall; Denderah Temple, Upper Egypt.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Reliefs of Cleopatra and her son Caesarion carved into the wall of the Temple of Hathor at the Dendera Temple Complex.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cleopatra, Queen of Egypt, d 30 B. C.
Antiquities; Egyptian language
Hieroglyphics; People; Temples
bas-reliefs (sculpture)
